definition: ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations

sentences.english: On halloween , people burn the fire to drive the evils away.
sentences.chinese: 萬聖節時人麼點燃熊熊大火來驅逐妖魔鬼怪。

sentences.english: She was full of fear to hear the story about the ghosts and the monsters.
sentences.chinese: 她滿懷恐懼地聽那些妖魔鬼怪的故事。

sentences.english: And above all, don't you HANDLE the witch-things.
sentences.chinese: 頂頂要緊的是，你別去碰那些妖魔鬼怪的東西。

sentences.english: Goku may be ghosts and goblins have been eliminated or captured, as early as left the Dragon King's palace.
sentences.chinese: 可能是妖魔鬼怪已被悟空消滅或生擒，早離開了龍宮。

sentences.english: It's haunted with Buddhist demons and devils. Their mission is the endless punishment of human sinners.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有佛教的妖魔鬼怪，任務是懲罰作奸犯科之人。

sentences.english: No man ever dares to go near it because it is haunted by evil spirits.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人敢走近它，因爲有妖魔鬼怪在作崇。

sentences.english: Moon Mountain is home to a variety of ghosts and goblins, to go out this fan must go through the ghost door.
sentences.chinese: 朔山住着各種妖魔鬼怪，要出門就得經過這扇鬼門。

sentences.english: In olden times jiaozi were thought to scare away evil spirits misfortune and disease.
sentences.chinese: 在古代，餃子被嚇跑妖魔鬼怪，不幸和疾病。

sentences.english: If there's a social hierarchy among monsters, zombies are not at the top of the list. They may not even be on the list.
sentences.chinese: 如果妖魔鬼怪也有社會等級，殭屍並不會列在榜首。

definition: evil monsters/(fig.) bad characters/(political) bad elements
Daoist immortal/supernatural entity/(in modern fiction) fairy, elf, leprechaun etc/fig. lighthearted person
